dress_style.description: Style terms specific to dresses. Other style terms that describe a dress's skirt may be found under the Skirt Style attribute.

Examples include: Embellished, Peplum, Faux-Wrap, Shift, Polo, Shirt Dress, Sheath, A-line, Bodicon, Mermaid, Maxi, Cocktail, Boho, Little Black Dress, Twofer, Slip Dress, Mini, Poodle, Sun Dress, Surplice, T-shirt, Ball Gown, Skater, Wrap, Jacket Dress, Fit & Flare, Tutus, Evening Gown, Sweater.

graph.linkage_cypher: CREATE (n1:Apparel_Category {name: 'Dresses'})-[:HAS_PRODUCT_TYPE]->(n2:Product_Type {name: 'All Dress Product Type'})-[:FOLLOWS_GUIDELINE]->(n3:Guideline_Type {name: 'Naming Guidelines'})-[:HAS_REQUIREMENT]->(n4:dress_style {name: 'Style Terms and Specific Examples'})
